name: clear the ocean
description:
Check out my scratch profile for more cool games: legorack on Scratch (mit.edu)

You are the captain of a ship, trieing to clean the ocean from bombs. To destroy them you have to shoot at them with the arrow keys. But you have only 5 shoots at each cannon. To load more shoots, you have to drive in the grey square in the middle of the map!

Don´t steer into a bomb, your health won´t regenerate!

Your goal is to destroy 5 bombs. 

DRIVING: the ship points towards you rmousepointer. Click to drive

SHOOTING: press right arrow to fire right cannon and left arrow to fire left cannon
